# VSCode - TypeScript 代码片段

"obj array type": {
  "prefix": "j:ts-obj-arr-type",
  "description": "对象数组类型",
  "body": [
    "{[key: string]: any}[]",
  ],
},
"obj type": {
  "prefix": "j:ts-obj-type",
  "description": "对象类型",
  "body": [
    "{[key: string]: any}",
  ],
},
"ts disabled": {
  "prefix": "j:ts-disabled",
  "description": "下一行禁用 ts lint",
  "body": [
    "//tslint:disable-next-line",
  ],
}
